Date: Thursday, 2/2/1990
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Jack Morris

Regards,
Jeff Reardon

to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/16/1990
Subject: Status of Norberto Martin
Dear Sir,
Norberto Martin shouldn't play at AA Columbia Fireflies!
He has an AVG of .248 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
